name: PHP - Basic Setup
description: Minimal Sentry configuration for error tracking in a PHP application
useCase: Getting started with Sentry error tracking in PHP
seGuidance: Perfect for PHP applications just getting started with Sentry. This configuration captures all errors with essential context (environment, release). The SDK automatically captures uncaught exceptions and fatal errors.
configCode:
<?php

\Sentry\init([
    // Your DSN from Sentry project settings
    'dsn' => 'https://examplePublicKey@o0.ingest.sentry.io/0',
    
    // Identify the environment
    'environment' => 'production',
    
    // Track which version is deployed
    'release' => 'my-php-app@1.0.0',
]);
